thread.title: Buy Commercial Property for the Income, Study Says

author: Laura Kusisto
title: Buy Commercial Property for the Income, Study Says
text:
Commercial real estate is a good investment for income not, as most investors believe, rising property prices, according to a new study.
Over the course of a seven-year holding period, apartments and industrial, office and retail space all generated unlevered returns in the roughly 7% to 9% range, according to a new study by Mark Eppli, a professor of finance at Marquette University, and Charles Tu, a professor of commercial real estate at the University of San Diego. The study was commissioned by the National Multifamily...
